meanings.definition: Already formatted in a specific way before being used.
meanings.sent1: The preformatted document was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using preformatted templates for her presentations.
meanings.sent3: The preformatted paper made the teacher's job simpler.
meanings.sent4: His preformatted schedule was like a well-organized puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The preformatted design stood out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: He preformatted the text before printing it.
meanings.sent2: Remember to preformat the document before sharing it.
meanings.sent3: She preformatted the recipe for a quick cooking session.
meanings.sent4: The team preformatted the presentation for a smooth delivery.
meanings.sent5: Preformatting the data saved them a lot of time.
